content: प्रसक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Attached to, connected with. {@--2@} Excessively attached or fond; <ls>Pt. 1. 193.</ls> {@--3@} Adhering or sticking to. {@--4@} Fixed or intent upon, devoted or addicted to, engaged in, applied to; <ls>Śi. 9. 63</ls>; so द्यूत°, निद्रा° &c. {@--5@} Contiguous, near. {@--6@} Constant, incessant, uninterrupted; <ls>Ki. 4. 18</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 40</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4. 6</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 1.</ls> {@--7@} Got, obtained, gained. {@--8@} Expanded, opened. --क्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Incessantly, continuously; <ls>Ki. 16. 55.</ls>
